AttributeVariant.Text: BICYCLES: No self-service loading by sender

I.lead: Between Schiers and Fideris on the Landquart - Klosters Platz line, no train services are operating.
I.text:
Between Schiers and Fideris on the Landquart - Klosters Platz line, no train services are operating.

Long-distance trains RE 12xx Disentis / Mustér - Landquart - Scuol-Tarasp are cancelled between Schiers and Klosters Platz.
Long-distance trains RE 10xx Landquart - Davos Platz are cancelled between Landquart and Fideris.

Long-distance trains RE 13xx Landquart - St.Moritz are cancelled.
Passengers travelling from Landquart to St.Moritz via Chur / Thusis.

Replacement bus services are operating Schiers - Fideris.

Please allow for a longer travelling time.

Reason: Landslide


Duration of of interruption expected until 17.06.2016 18:00.
